com.lukeleber.scandroid.gui.fragments

Class LiveDatastream.Refresher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukeleber.scandroid.gui.fragments.LiveDatastream.Refresher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    LiveDatastream

    private final class LiveDatastream.Refresher
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A helper class to refresh the live datastream at a user-defined interval. Note - the refresh rate is not guaranteed and is provided on a best-attempt basis.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long DEFAULT_REFRESH_RATE 
      private java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService executor 
      private long lastRefresh 
      private long refreshRate 
      private int remaining 
      private boolean stopped

      Constructor and Description
      LiveDatastream.Refresher()
      Constructs a Refresher with the DEFAULT_REFRESH_RATE.
      LiveDatastream.Refresher(long refreshRate)
      Constructs a Refresher with the provided target refresh rate

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) long getRefreshRate()
      Retrieves the target refresh rate
      void run()
      Starts executing the active part of the class' code.
      (package private) void scheduleRefresh()
      Invoked on the GUI thread when all expected responses have been received, this method calculates the time required to meet the next scheduled update and re-submits this object to its executor service.
      (package private) void setRefreshRate(long refreshRate)
      Sets the target refresh rate
      void start()

      • scheduleRefresh

        void scheduleRefresh()
        Invoked on the GUI thread when all expected responses have been received, this method calculates the time required to meet the next scheduled update and re-submits this object to its executor service.
